system.description:
At the end of the round all your allies gain resistance to one of the following elements:

  • @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.FAfKTXxluiqIVP5t]{Fire Resistance} @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.SWdZeuJTEq1ig6S8]{Ice Resistance}

  • @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.3tMyw1mCjd7SfGTD]{Air Resistance}@EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.H3SJ1fej3GSyHdKG]{Earth Resistance}

  • @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.fBbLvII5LUEqInQQ]{Dark Resistance}@EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Xab6AwcRhoxVhygu]{Light Resistance}

  • @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.QrEztsujMpK33cpj]{Bolt Resistance}@EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.3xPA7x9S3fggYHkX]{Poison Resistance}

This can only be used once per conflict.
